messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

On Tue, Feb 14, 2012 at 9:22 AM, <adg@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> runtime, syscall: fix freebsd build
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5661047/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5661047/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/runtime/os_freebsd.h
>  M src/pkg/runtime/signal_**freebsd_amd64.c
>  M src/pkg/syscall/zerrors_**freebsd_amd64.go
>
>
>

This doesn't completely fix the build, but it allows it to progress further.

Andrew

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=69b9e146e19c ***

runtime, syscall: fix freebsd build

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5661047

subject: code review 5661047: runtime, syscall: fix freebsd build
